member.summary: Index should have unique values, but multiple rows with null values should be accepted.

member.name: M:FluentMigrator.SqlAnywhere.SqlAnywhereExtensions.UniqueNullsDistinct(FluentMigrator.Builders.Create.Index.ICreateIndexOptionsSyntax,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Index should have unique values. Only one row with null value should be accepted (default for most known database engines).

true when nulls should be distinct
